descriptionHtml:
*THIS FOLLOWER REQUIRES DAWNGUARD*
*THIS FOLLOWER REQUIRES DAWNGUARD*
*THIS FOLLOWER REQUIRES DAWNGUARD*

He\'s a manly Argonian that breathes fire, what else is there to say?  Oh and he uses a special weapon, a Dragonbone 2 hander...with 1 hand!  
Its enchanted with a fire effect, but dont worry, once it runs out of charges, he can kill things to recharge it.

He\'s chillin\' outside Bthalft killing bandits as we speak.  He wants to go on adventures.

Credit to Frstwlf for his One handed Dragonbone Greatsword mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21758/

Credit to nockchaa for his skeleton mod...although mine is heavily edited and close to vanilla as is.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6239

I didn\'t include this, but I recommend using this with it, unless you like the no pants version of Ancient Nordic armor.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4486/

*THIS FOLLOWER REQUIRES DAWNGUARD*
*THIS FOLLOWER REQUIRES DAWNGUARD*
*THIS FOLLOWER REQUIRES DAWNGUARD*
author: Buffscale McThundertail
